name: Prado Luxury Car Driving Race
description:
Show your real driving skills and transport passengers on time. Drive your van with 4x4 engines with other traffic vehicles on the beautiful roads and also on the country side. Ride your vehicle fast to reach at your destination in time. Experience the real thrill and adventure of big van driving in this game. Drive carefully on the sharp turns it’s your duty to transport your passengers safe on their desired location.

Pick the passengers from one place and drop them off on the other location at the right time. Drive fast to reach at your destination but be careful passenger safety is your first priority.

Get cash at the success of every level, unlock new missions and buy more beautiful highest car. If you do not reach at your destination in time your will over and you have to start it again.

How to Play
• Start the Game
• Tilt to move left right
• Press break button to slow down

Features
• Very smooth and realistic van control
• Beautiful city and off road environment
• Realistic sound effects
• Wonderful tracks for driving
• Interesting and challenging missions
